Title: Consortium of eight banks comes to the aid of government
Content: The Telangana Drinking Water Supply Project (Mission Bhagiratha) has got approval for sanction of Rs. 6,750 crore loan by a consortium of eight banks, led by Andhra Bank. The other banks are Dena Ban
Author: Staff Reporter
Description: The Telangana Drinking Water Supply Project (Mission Bhagiratha) has got approval for sanction of Rs. 6,750 crore loan by a consortium of eight banks, led by Andhra Bank. The other banks are Dena Ban
